headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://www.paypal.com https://www.paypalobjects.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com; img-src 'self' data: https://www.paypal.com https://www.paypalobjects.com https://www.google.com; connect-src 'self' https://api.paypal.com https://api-m.paypal.com https://www.paypal.com; frame-src 'self' https://www.paypal.com https://www.google.com; object-src 'none'; upgrade-insecure-requests;
